Package com.rift.coad.rdf.semantic.persistance

Interface Summary
PersistanceManager  
PersistanceProperty This object represents a property.
PersistanceQuery This interface provides method to manipulate a query.
PersistanceResource The resource responsible for managing the persistance of information.
PersistanceResultRow This method object contains the persistant result row information.
PersistanceSession This interface defines the method to manage the perstance to the backend data store.
PersistanceTransaction This interface defines the methods to manage a transaction on behalf of a persistance session.
 

Class Summary
DefaultPersistanceManagerFactory This class is responsible for constructing the default persistance manager.
PersistanceConstants The constants used by the persistance layer
PersistanceIdentifier This object represents the identification information for a resource or property.
PersistanceManagerFactory This factory is responsible for instanciating the appopriate persitance manager.
 

Exception Summary
PersistanceException  
PersistanceQueryException  
PersistanceUnknownException This object represents a persistance unknown exception.
